Package com.att.research.xacml.std.pip.engines.jdbc

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JDBCResolver
    JDBCResolver is the interface used by the JDBCEngine to create PreparedStatements for XACML attribute requests and convert the ResultSet into XACML attributes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurableJDBCResolver
    Implements the JDBCResolver for SQL queries with parameters in their prepared statements specified as XACML Attribute values.
    JDBCEngine
    PIPEgineJDBC extends StdConfigurableEngine to implement a PIP that retrieves XACML attributes from a database using JDBC.
